about_the_game:
In this chapter, taking place directly after the events of chapter 1, the party will venture to a new unknown land across the canyon in Bosquapital Forest: Mr Somewhere, the home of the Mr. Somethings. There they will meet new and familiar faces (including a mysterious wizard named Wandalf) who will help guide them towards discovering a sinister plot from CeratoCorp™.



Join the fight against the corporation with an all new playable character: Mullet Something!
Mullet Something is incredibly fast with a fairly high attack stat. Of course, Mr. Somethings always have to run in order to survive, so he sprints around at all times. He can jump over large gaps, slide into tight spaces, and even use nearby generators to destroy certain dangerous objects!

  • Meet a weird old dude!
  • Experience less depression!
  • Find out that old dude is an all powerful wizard!
  • Experience even less depression!
  • Kill your former coworkers! (again)
  • Watch TV!
  • Find meaning in your life!
  • Fight a spyder!
  • Die a painful death!
  • Meet like, over 15 different races! (Spoiler: One of them is Mr. Somethings)
  • Spelunk in a cave!
  • Creep around a university dorm building!
  • Eat some baked goods that you found in the desert! (dessert in the desert, if you will. (or if you won't. (I don't really care.)))
  • Walk on some clouds!
  • Drop out of college!
  • Fight a giant wyrm!
  • And make many other questionable decisions!

Get ready for the second chapter of the insane world of Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life!

*The squirrel seems to be gone this time.
*Or has it simply taken a new form...
*. .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . .... . ....





Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life
Chapter 2:
Jeebo & Jerbo vs. The Wall

Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life is a story focused Metroidvania/Party Based JRPG told in chapters! The overworld plays like a standard 2D Metroidvania where unlocking new party members allows you to access previously inaccessible locations due to their unique movement abilities! For example, Jeebo can wall jump, and Jerbo can pogo jump off of normally dangerous obstacles.




It differs from standard Metroidvanias in that when you encounter an enemy the game switches into a Party Based JRPG where you must strategize your actions in order to succeed!



Chapter 2 contains four playable characters, each with their own unique movement abilities to help aid in exploration and each with their own move set for use in battles!



Join our community on Discord!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 1GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Really needs a bit less disk space (Disk Space required is for both Chapters 1 & 2)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In the bizarre chapter 2 of the Metroidvania/party-based JRPG, it's up to you to stop the evil plans of CeratoCorp with the help of a new party member, Mullet Something, and a strange wizard named Wandalf to save Mr. Somewhere, the homeland of the Mr. Somethings!
